author: Cedric
content:
I'm one of those people who posts rarely and I do agree that every time I post it feels like the last post and I dare say one day that will be true. The gaps between posts do seem to grow. In any case it's nice to know that you are continuing on as it's always a pleasure stopping by here.

This particular image is especially cool. I like the yellow "border" on two sides and of course I like the grungy feel of it.
